select mer.* ,wu.name as username,mp.name as productname from tb_mtx_exchange_record mer left join tb_wp_user wu on wu.uuid=mer.userid left join tb_mtx_product mp on mp.uuid=mer.productid where TRUE
and wu.name like concat("%", #{mtxExchangeRecord.username},"%")
and mp.name like concat("%", #{mtxExchangeRecord.productname},"%")
order by mer.createon,mer.userid desc;
